Algorithm: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of sites active for the study

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfPtsEnrolled_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of participants currently enrolled in the study

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfPtsActive_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of participants currently active in the study

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfPtsComplete_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of participants currently complete in the study a

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfPtsWithdrawn_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of participants currently withdrawn in the study

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfCRFsCompleted_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of CRFs or data elements entered for the study

Algorithm: SELECT AVG(percentCRFsReviewed_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Percentage of the CRFs or data elements that have been reviewed

Algorithm: SELECT AVG(percentCRFsIncomplete_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Percentage of CRFs or data elements that are incomplete

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfUnresolvedQueries_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of unresolved queries for this study

Algorithm: SELECT SUM(noOfSignificantProtocolDeviations_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;

SELECT SUM(noOfSAEs_site) FROM SiteInformation INNER JOIN StudyInformation ON SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID AND SiteInformation.siteNumber=StudyInformation.ProposalID WHERE SiteInformation.ProposalID=StudyInformation.ProposalID;
Description: Number of SAEs for this study
